QuestData.Title: Target: Hive'Zora Hive Sisters
QuestData.Description: Reinforcements have been called on to join the assault on Hive'Zora. You have been selected to target Hive'Zora hive sisters. Report back to Commander Mar'alith after completing your task.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 30 Hive'Zora Hive Sisters and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Combat Task Briefing V in order to complete this quest.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have something to tell me, $C?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $N. You're a worthy ally.
